name: Remity
description:
Journey through a dreamy and hostile land, filled with strange characters and heart-warming  stories in "Remity" a top-down action dungeon crawler about a fox trapped phasing between the world of the awake and the world of the dreaming. Experience the first dungeon that takes about 30 minutes to complete in this teaser demo!

  • Get a small taste of the winding story which will unfold throughout the course of the game with a diverse cast of characters facing an otherworldly conflict
  • Tight, fast paced gameplay reminiscent of early 2D dungeon crawlers, while adding an emphasis on precision, and rewarding skill
  • A dense opening level. Early rooms help familiarize you with your toolkit in Remity while later rooms will present tricky challenges
  • A pixel art style with modern sensibilities
  • Tough but fair boss fights. Choose how to approach them with the varied and creative combat tools at your disposal
  • Use your skills with a sword to slay enemies or rely on your mysterious new chalk powers to battle enemies in a creative and efficient way
  • A completely original Soundtrack

Keep your wits about you traveler, as not everything in Remity is as it seems...
